places.generalDescription: Maliwan Thai Cooking Class is a popular choice for those looking to learn how to cook authentic Thai dishes while in Bangkok. The class typically includes a visit to a local market where participants can select fresh ingredients with the guidance of an instructor. This family-friendly experience allows both adults and children to immerse themselves in the local culinary culture. After purchasing the necessary items, participants return to the cooking school where they are taught how to prepare four traditional Thai dishes.

sources.shortName: Romantic Bangkok - Things to do and attractions for couples

sources.snippet: Bond over the art of Thai cuisine by taking a cooking class together. It's a fun, engaging activity and a chance to take a piece of Thailand home with you.
sources.shortName: Things to Do in Bangkok for Couples

places.name: Maliwan Thai Cooking Class

reviews.text: A friendly and cheerful Thai chef welcomes you with a warm smile and teaches you how to prepare delicious Thai dishes entirely from scratch. The experience begins with a visit to the local food market, where you get to know the fresh ingredients - a valuable and enriching part of the day. During the cooking session, special attention is given to allergies and dietary preferences. After about two hours of cooking, you sit down to enjoy the four dishes you've made. Anything you can't finish can be taken home in a doggy bag. A fantastic experience we highly recommend!

I loved my customized cooking class only for me due to my allergy to crustacean. The communication was great in accommodating my needs and timing. The staff were friendly and knowledgeable. Highlight of my trip to Bangkok and I highly recommended this to anyone. I will definitely plan to go back for more dishes  to learn. Thank you again for enjoyable experience.

Just a plain awesome experience. Our teacher May was fun, lively and full of knowledge and her helpers always buzzing in the background keeping the experience running smoothly. We learned heaps and were a bit stunned that we were able to cook dishes that tasted so good with such ease! Highly recommend, and very central if you're in Khaosan area.

places.address: 9 Thanon Sap Sam Hang, Taladyod Phra Nakhon, Bangkok 10200, Thailand

places.generalDescription: S√ºhring is a high-end restaurant in Bangkok that offers a whimsical take on modern German cuisine. Run by identical twin master chefs Thomas and Mathias Suhring, the restaurant is housed in a beautiful old villa converted into an intimate garden setting. The 12-course Erlebnis tasting menu features meticulously prepared dishes that showcase quality, seasonality, and simplicity.

sources.snippet: S√úHRING, a modern German restaurant located at Soi Yen Akat 3, has a sense of luxury and beauty which stems from its modern atmosphere and view overlooking a tropical garden. The seating area is divided into zones, and the most romantic area of the restaurant is the Winter Garden corner, which features a panoramic garden view that is decorated with lights by night. The restaurant serves both modern German cuisine and more traditional recipes, along with many German and old world wines.
sources.shortName: The 10 Most Romantic Places to Drink Wine in Bangkok

sources.snippet: Nestled within a picturesque 1970s villa, this upscale dining establishment exudes elegance, boasting a charming garden setting. Helmed by the S√ºhring twin brothers, the restaurant draws inspiration from cherished family recipes, expertly curated to showcase their culinary prowess. Each dish offers a nostalgic voyage through the brothers‚Äô German upbringing, meticulously crafted with premium ingredients and artfully presented.
sources.shortName: The Best Things for Couples to Do in Vibrant Bangkok

places.name: S√ºhring

reviews.text:
Outstanding and highly recommended!  Very unique 2 Michelin star ‚≠êÔ∏è German experience in a quaint neighborhood of Bangkok.  Prix fixe menu with 2 options and do not be fooled as the number of courses involve multiple items, some as many as 5 on one course!  Amazing wine list and wonderful informative staff make your overall experience a must. The chefs kitchen area is a little dramatic as the restaurant so be sure to request a table at the bar facing the kitchen.
Nothing like this exists in Bangkok nor Germany to be frank.  The 2 sons make their Oma proud elevating her recipes.

A delightful experience in Bangkok. I wished we would have been told about the wine pairing before ordering a bottle. But then again, it's my fault, perhaps for not asking.
Food was intricate and presented mostly in bite-sized portions. Those with bigger appetites may still feel hungry at the end, but for us, it was ok.
I felt the service was good and attentive.
It is pricey, but you pay for what you get.

S√ºhring is a beautiful blend of modern German fine dining and warm hospitality. Set in a restored villa, it's elegant yet welcoming. Every course was thoughtfully prepared, from delicate starters to hearty mains, all highlighting seasonal ingredients. We especially loved the appetizers - the trout, lobster, and duck were the most memorable. We tried both the wine pairing and the non-alcoholic pairing, and both complemented the dishes perfectly. Service was friendly without being overbearing, making it a truly memorable dining experience in Bangkok.

places.address: 10 Soi Yen Akat 3, Chong Nonsi, Yan Nawa, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Perched atop the Banyan Tree Bangkok, Vertigo & Moon Bar Rooftop has been recognized as one of the world's top ten rooftop bars. The breathtaking views make it an ideal spot for a romantic evening. The restaurant offers a seafood grill with dishes like roasted snow fish and an Appetizer Plate featuring seared bay scallops, foie gras, tuna tartar, and lobster spring rolls.

sources.snippet: What better way to propose than among the clouds of one of the biggest and busiest cities in the world?. Located inside the luxurious Banyan Tree Bangkok is Vertigo, the rooftop restaurant offering patrons 360-degree views of the capital of Thailand. Bangkok‚Äôs sunsets are pretty spectacular, especially from a whopping 61 floors up.
sources.shortName: The Top Romantic Spots To Propose In Bangkok

sources.snippet: It's no secret that Bangkok's nightlife is one of the best in the world. And for couples looking to have a food time while out on the town, why not consider going to Moon Bar?. Perched atop the luxurious Banyan Tree Bangkok hotel on Sathon Road, it's the perfect cosmopolitan hotspot to cap off your romantic
sources.shortName: The Most Romantic Spots in Bangkok

places.name: Vertigo & Moon Bar Rooftop

reviews.text:
An exceptional rooftop experience, undoubtedly among the finest Bangkok has to offer. From the moment we arrived, the atmosphere exuded an air of refined elegance, setting the perfect tone for the evening. We enjoyed a thoughtfully curated three-course meal, with each dish meticulously prepared and beautifully presented. The free-flow mocktails were refreshing and expertly crafted, adding a delightful touch to the dining experience.

The service was exemplary - attentive without being intrusive, efficient yet genuinely warm. Every detail was handled seamlessly, allowing us to fully savor the evening. The panoramic rooftop views were breathtaking, offering an unrivaled perspective of Bangkok's skyline, while the city lights created a mesmerizing backdrop as night fell.

The music selection complemented the setting perfectly - lively enough to enrich the atmosphere yet subtle enough to allow easy conversation.

This venue is a true gem in Bangkok's luxury scene, where exceptional cuisine, impeccable service, and spectacular views come together effortlessly. Highly recommended for celebrating special occasions or indulging in an unforgettable night above the city.

An unforgettable rooftop experience with a full 360¬∞ view of Bangkok! üåÜüåâ This bar offers a stunning panorama - you can choose to sit facing the vibrant city skyline or enjoy a more relaxed vibe with views of the river. The atmosphere is upscale yet welcoming. Just a quick heads-up: there is a dress code, so be sure to wear polite attire or long trousers, otherwise you won't be allowed in. The food was absolutely delicious, and the drinks were top-notch. A must-visit spot for anyone wanting to see Bangkok from above. Hope you have an amazing night!

It was the BEST Vertigo experience i ever had! The view was spectacular plus the service during our dinner was first class. I ordered mushroom soup for my starter and it was served nicely by pouring the soup on the bowl of cream. It was however not as hot as I expected it but lukewarm. It was followed by my main course of tiger prawns which was also warm. I'm not sure if it was also because we were seated outside on the highest point of the building that it is not easy to maintain it's appropriate food temperature. Anyway Service was excellent! The part when they gave us a souvenir photo was noteworthy.

places.address: 21/100 S Sathon Rd, Thung Maha Mek, Sathon, Bangkok 10120, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park, an IHG Hotel, is a luxurious accommodation located in the heart of downtown Bangkok. Situated near Patpong Street and within walking distance of MBK Shopping Mall, this upscale hotel offers stunning city views and top-notch amenities. Guests can enjoy a rooftop pool, a fitness center, and a Cantonese bar/restaurant with international cuisine.
places.name: Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park by IHG

reviews.text:
You can tell ALL you need to know about hotel from the room service.

Gorgeous buffet breakfast
Immaculate and very courteous staff

Then I got back to my room (I'd only left it for an hour!) and everything was reset (including be quickly vacuumed!) with a smile and a bow. Feeling VERY relaxed and cared for by the friendly staff here.

Thank you for a GREAT first day in Bangkok!!

Photos are of my reset room (which to me makes all the difference for a great stay)

Excellent Stay ‚Äì Great Improvements and Exceptional Service!

I recently returned to the Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park and was truly impressed by the improvements since my last visit. On a previous stay, I had some unfortunate experiences that left me disappointed. However, I am happy to say that those issues have been fully resolved, and this time I felt genuinely valued as a guest.

One of the absolute highlights of my stay was the Club Lounge. The atmosphere is calm and elegant, and the happy hour from 5:30 PM to 7:30 PM is a fantastic experience, offering a nice selection of drinks and delicious snacks. I would especially like to commend the lounge staff ‚Äì Kathy, Pop, and Puri ‚Äì who provided outstanding, professional service. Their attentiveness and warm hospitality made all the difference and turned my stay into something truly special.

Another standout feature is the pool area, which is beautifully maintained and perfect for relaxing after a day in the city. Whether you're swimming or simply enjoying the peaceful setting, it's a great place to unwind.

Thanks to the wonderful improvements and exceptional team, I have completely revised my previous negative opinion and am now looking forward to staying regularly at the Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park again. Highly recommended!

Stayed for 6 days and was consistently impressed. Every single day, my room was refreshed, cleaned, and tidied with care-always with a smile and warm professionalism. The buffet breakfast was delicious, and the staff were courteous and attentive throughout. Felt truly looked after. A wonderful experience from start to finish!

places.address: 952 Rama IV Rd, Khwaeng Suriya Wong, Khet Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Featherstone Cafe is a stylish and hip establishment located in Bangkok's Ekkamai district. The cafe boasts a vintage aesthetic with an Old World European interior and a gift shop offering locally-sourced, handmade items. The menu features French- and Italian-inspired dishes such as truffle mushroom pasta, white wine-cooked mussels, and French onion soup. Don't miss their signature drink, the Wild Gardenia, which is a refreshing concoction with flower petals and lavender syrup.

sources.snippet: Although its apothecary theme does sound a bit freaky, Featherstone Bistro Caf√© & Lifestyle Shop exudes dreamy vibes thanks to its mix of bistro decor and the sapphire-shade walls and retro windows. The French and Italian menu also boasts a selection of romantic fare fit for a date with your loved one. Featherstone Bistro Caf√© & Lifestyle Shop, 60 Ekamai 12, Bangkok, +6697 058 6846; open: Mon-Sun, 10:30 am-10 pm.
sources.shortName: 12 romantic cafes for a date in Bangkok
41 romantic things to do in Bangkok for a romantic couple vacation

places.name: Featherstone

reviews.text:
Featherstone is a charming spot with a great vibe! The atmosphere is cozy and beautifully designed, making it a perfect place for a relaxing meal or catching up with friends. I tried the pasta, and it was flavorful and nicely presented. The service was friendly and attentive, which added to the overall experience.

However, the prices are on the higher side for the portion sizes, so it might not be the best option if you're looking for something budget-friendly. That said, the ambiance and quality make it worth visiting at least once. Definitely a spot to check out if you're in the mood for a treat!

A beautifully designed caf√© with a stylish and cozy atmosphere. The interior is charming, with a unique vintage touch that makes it a great spot to relax. The food and drinks were delicious, with well-balanced flavors and great presentation. The staff was also very friendly and attentive, adding to the overall pleasant experience.

This restaurant is great for dates, friends or family gatherings‚ú®

Quality service and friendly staff are prominent. The interior design has a vintage touch. It is on a quiet street, so you can enjoy a pleasant conversation and enjoy the ambiance and delicious food. Smoked duck Alfredo Prata was creamy and cheesy. Peach Pie Moonshine soda was not overly sweet, which is rare in Thailand. Spinach gratin was edible, not dry. The portions were generous. A bit pricey tho.

places.address: 60 Ekkamai 12 Alley, Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Sirocco is an upscale restaurant located on the 63rd floor, offering a delightful experience of Mediterranean cuisine and fine wine. It's renowned for its enchanting atmosphere and delectable food, making it a popular choice for special occasions like proposals. The restaurant has received numerous awards and boasts a stunning Sky Bar adjacent to its romantically lit staircase. With its unbeatable 360-degree view of Bangkok, Sirocco is considered one of the most famous rooftop venues in the world.

sources.snippet: An enchanting combination of delicious food, excellent wine, and an atmosphere that can not be beaten are what husbands and wives to-be can expect at Sirocco. The word is out about this five-star restaurant, and it is recommended that those who wish to dine here make reservations at least a week ahead of time. With a long list of awards and the stunning Sky Bar just adjacent to its romantically lit staircase for a post-engagement celebration drink, there is no better place to propose than at Sirocco.
sources.shortName: The Top Romantic Spots To Propose In Bangkok

sources.snippet: SIROCCO is located in the luxurious golden dome on the 63rd floor of the Lebua at State Tower, on Silom Road. This venue is known throughout the world, and if you are looking to give your partner a truly iconic romantic night out, enjoying a magical moonlight dinner with a wine chosen from their extensive wine list will surely create a lasting memory for you both.
sources.shortName: The 10 Most Romantic Places to Drink Wine in Bangkok

places.name: Sirocco

reviews.text: Awesome venue for dinner.   Worth the price of food to enjoy this view and service.  The food is not amazing but a concerted effort at high-end med. Cuisine in Bangkok.  We were here 20 years ago and this was still equally memorable.  Just don't order alcohol.  $40 Canadian for a cocktail!

My first time dining at The Dome was nothing short of extraordinary! From the moment I walked in, I was blown away by the incredible view. But what truly made the experience exceptional was the outstanding service -the waiters were attentive, warm, and made me and my friends so welcome.

The food was exquisite and beautifully presented. Every dish felt like a masterpiece, and I couldn't have asked for a better culinary experience.

Between the delicious food, impeccable service, and breathtaking ambiance, The Dome has instantly become one of my favourite restaurants. I can't wait to return!

We had the most unforgettable experience celebrating our 7th anniversary here. Every moment was truly special. The cuisine was exquisitely delicious-each dish bursting with flavor and presented beautifully. The staff's attentiveness and warm hospitality far exceeded our expectations. A special thanks to the chef, who kindly customized my meal to accommodate my food allergies with such care and creativity. To top it all off, they surprised us with the most stunning and delightful edible desserts, making our celebration even more memorable. A heartfelt thank you for making our special day so magical!

places.address: 64th Floor, State Tower Bangkok, 1055 Si Lom Rd, Si Lom, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

places.generalDescription: The Gardens of Dinsor Palace, nestled in the heart of Bangkok's Watthana district, offers a romantic and tranquil escape from the city's hustle and bustle. Housed within a former royal mansion, this enchanting oasis features meticulously maintained grounds with lush greenery, an artificial pond inhabited by swans, and even rabbits and peacocks roaming freely. The old-fashioned villa exudes fairytale charm while the restaurant boasts a refined atmosphere with elegant outdoor and indoor dining areas.

sources.snippet: From one natural oasis to another, the Gardens of Dinsor Palace are also among the most romantic spots in Bangkok. Though it's located at the heart of the city's Watthana district, known for its big malls filled with luxury shopping, the place is set up to serve as the perfect tropical retreat in the middle of the bustling metropolis. The old-fashioned villa, the tall lush trees, and the artificial pond with swans all make up a dreamy escape that almost feels unreal.
sources.shortName: The Most Romantic Spots in Bangkok

sources.snippet: As for food, there‚Äôs a wide range of delectable Western options ranging from brunch favourites like Duck Confit & Crispy Waffle to Mushroom Risotto & Truffle Oil.
sources.shortName: 41 romantic things to do in Bangkok for a romantic couple vacation

places.name: The Gardens of Dinsor Palace

reviews.text: I visited here with my regional team from England to celebrate, and overall it was a good experience. ü¶öü•ÇThe gardens offer a peaceful and relaxed atmosphere that's perfect for a team gathering, and the natural setting really made our celebration memorable. One highlight was the big white peacock inside-he was incredibly charming and elegant, adding a unique touch to the ambiance. While the venue isn't overly fancy, it provides a great backdrop for quality time together. ü§ç

The Garden of Dinsor Palace, Bangkok

Tucked away in the heart of Bangkok, The Garden of Dinsor Palace is a charming and elegant spot that offers a peaceful escape from the city's hustle. Housed in a beautifully restored European-style mansion that once belonged to royalty, this place is more than just a restaurant - it's an experience.

The ambiance is serene and romantic, with lush green gardens, swan-filled ponds, and cozy seating both indoors and outdoors. Whether you're enjoying a quiet brunch or a candlelit dinner, the setting is perfect for a relaxing meal.

The menu offers a variety of Thai and international dishes with a modern twist. I tried the truffle pasta and the grilled salmon - both were flavorful and beautifully presented. The desserts and coffee were equally impressive.

It's also a great spot for photos, with its elegant architecture and garden views. Service is attentive, and the atmosphere is peaceful, making it ideal for dates, gatherings, or even solo unwinding.

A lovely and cozy restaurant with a quiet, relaxed atmosphere. The food is delicious, offering a mix of Thai and Western dishes. Perfect for a casual meal with family - easygoing and enjoyable every time.

places.generalDescription: Le Normandie by Alain Roux is a renowned restaurant in Bangkok, offering contemporary French cuisine and an exceptional wine collection. Located on the top floor of the hotel's Chao Phraya Wing, it provides stunning views of the river through its floor-to-ceiling windows. With sparkling chandeliers and antique furnishings, this culinary hub has been a fixture in Bangkok for 40 years.

sources.snippet: For six decades, Le Normandie has been the foremost choice for refined French cuisine. The restaurant currently collaborates with Chef Alain Roux from the three-MICHELIN-Starred Waterside Inn in Bray, UK, who supervises operations. Their classic and elegant French cuisine boasts refined techniques and exquisite flavor combinations.
sources.shortName: These Are the Most Romantic Restaurants in Bangkok

sources.snippet: Located within the Mandarin Oriental Hotel, Le Normandie has reigned as Bangkok‚Äôs premier destination for sophisticated French cuisine for over sixty years. Now under the guidance of renowned Chef Alain Roux from the three-MICHELIN-Starred Waterside Inn in Bray, UK, the restaurant offers elegant, classic French dishes crafted with refined techniques and exquisite flavour pairings. With its breathtaking views of the Chao Phraya River and intricate floral displays, Le Normandie provides an ideal backdrop for an unforgettable dining experience.
sources.shortName: The Best Things for Couples to Do in Vibrant Bangkok

sources.snippet: For a truly romantic night out in Bangkok, treat yourself to dinner at Le Normandie. This classy French restaurant on the top floor of The Oriental Hotel is a Bangkok institution, and the second Michelin Guide to Bangkok made it one of only four restaurants to get two stars. Fois gras and roasted Sisteron rack of lamb are just some of the menu highlights prepared by the visiting French master chefs in residence here, all taken in amidst elegance with views of the Chao Phraya River to boot.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Romantic Things to Do in Bangkok

places.name: Le Normandie

reviews.text: A wonderful evening with excellent food and equally excellent service. Kyan and k Oxygen were amazing hosts accompanying us throughout the dinner service. A big thank you for a great evening !

Perched gracefully above the Mandarin Oriental Bangkok, Le Normandie offers an exquisite dining experience that seamlessly blends timeless French sophistication with the vibrant essence of Bangkok.

Overlooking the serene Chao Phraya River, the restaurant's ambiance is enhanced by handcrafted chandeliers, plush furnishings, and panoramic views, creating an atmosphere of refined luxury.

The dining experience is further elevated by impeccable service, where each course is presented with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring that guests are not only satiated but also enchanted.  The restaurant's dedication to excellence has been recognized with two Michelin stars, affirming its status as a premier destination for haute cuisine in Thailand.

Le Normandie is more than a meal; it's a journey through the rich tapestry of French gastronomy, set against the backdrop of Bangkok's dynamic landscape.

For those seeking an unparalleled dining experience that marries tradition with innovation, Le Normandie stands as a testament to culinary artistry at its finest.

Definitely one of our favorite fine dining. Our experience was perfect and the food was delicious. We went during the beginning of the spring 2024 menu, which the staff told us will run until around June or July. The monk fish was my personal favorite. They change their menu four times a year. The atmosphere is always good, and it was never busy every time we went. But would recommend you book your table.

places.address: 48 Oriental Ave, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Thanon Khao San, a bustling urban area, is a popular resting place for backpackers offering various types of accommodations, shops, and bars. Once known as a hippie and backpacker haven, it has now evolved into a more upscale destination while still maintaining its affordable lodging options. Visitors can enjoy shopping for second-hand English books and Thai souvenirs such as clothing, jewelry, and DVDs. Additionally, the area is famous for pirated movies and fake designer products.

sources.snippet: Forget about Khao San Road, RCA, and even Soi 11, as a couple, you need to go out in Thonglor and Ekkemai.
sources.shortName: 15 Things To Do In Bangkok For Couples 2023 - Unique Activities

places.name: Thanon Khao San

reviews.text:
A super busy and vibrant street during the night. We went there for a late night walk. The street was buzzing with people and loud music everywhere.
We had some snacks at some kiosks and we walked around for almost an hour.
Ideal palce for people who like to party and enjoy their time.

. . . absolutely incredible vibe along the many restaurants, bars, massage boutiques, etc
Recommended for it's great ambience . . .
Best place for nightlife, but can get crowded sometimes. Amazing streetfood too.

places.address: Khwaeng Talat Yot, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand
